comment._content: Sailor Burke was a boxer who fought in the northeast circa 1908-1910

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: Shadrach Christopoulos: Can you give us a source for your information that Charles Prasser is the real name of Sailor Burke?  Thanks!
